message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could you consider offering it at $150?
Hi Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I've got to make a profit. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $165 to feel good about the sale. Can you consider $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I still can't meet you at $165. I am very committed to staying within my budget of $150. Would you consider meeting me at this price?
